reviews.name: Robert California
reviews.reviewDesc: No, I’m sorry, I just can’t sit idly by and have the gay youth of America misled by some reductionist pep talk. Sexuality is a spectrum. It’s a paradox to think of any sexual activity as “normal.” It gets better but it also gets vastly more complicated.
